BlogTalk 2.0 - Panel 1 SnipSnap, Zoomblox, Radio, Videoblogs

Jul 5, 2004

Video blogging and questions will be in a follow-up post:

▼ ❑ Stephan Schmidt - Fraunhofer Berlin
▼ ❑ Why KM doesn't work
• ❑ most KM is top down: mgmt decides what structures, tools, org, processes are used
• ❑ non matching ontologies
• ❑ most processes are too complicated
• ❑ complex tools - every release, tools are more complicated, no user acceptance ▼ ❑ What is bottom up KM
▼ ❑ from user to management
• ❑ -use own tools and processes
• ❑ -start gathering and collecting and floating knowledge, worry about structure • ❑ -structure knowledge later akin to 're-factoring' in software development • ❑ Self Organizing
• ❑ Emerging structure - do it the way you like it
▼ ❑ Phases
• ❑ Isolated Islands
• ❑ Connected through comments
• ❑ Developing Communities
• ❑ Meta Communities
▼ ❑ Why Blogs and SnipSnap?
• ❑ blogs ideal to spakrk off communities
• ❑ contain connection technologies
• ❑ maintained by enthusiasts
• ❑ wikis store knowledge
• ❑ sometimes done with management
▼ ❑ What is SnipSnap?
• ❑ blog and wiki
• ❑ GPL
• ❑ Java
• ❑ snipsnap.org
▼ ❑ Daniel Doegl, Zoomblox
• ❑ www.zoomblox.at
• ❑ Blogging++ for children
• ❑ will go online after beta finishes this summer
• ❑ all in Flash
• ❑ view "best blogs", view blogs, create your own
• ❑ cool animation where little people moving around represent a blog • ❑ internal emails
• ❑ "appropriate" content for children!
• ❑ can proactively monitor keywords and most updated and least updated blogs ▼ ❑ Joerg Kantel - Tools, Der Schockwellenreiter
• ❑ last year's ideas incorporated into ECHO
• ❑ blogs - alternate media of the future
• ❑ reuse alternate media ideas to do blogging adnd more
▼ ❑ Motiviation
• ❑ web is a writing environment
▼ ❑ A short history of the alternative media (Archaeologie des Bloggens) ▼ ❑ Radio
• ❑ government propaganda
• ❑ tool of the working class as well
▼ ❑ 1960s - beginning of free radio
• ❑ Radio Veronica (3 miles outside Amsterdam)
• ❑ cheap to build transmitter and receiver
▼ ❑ Alternative Magazines and Newspapers
• ❑ first time Joerg got arrested !
• ❑ F15 - why it crashed
• ❑ The freedom of press belongs to them who owns one!
▼ ❑ Movies
• ❑ alle macht fuer super acht - literally "Everybody does Super 8" • ❑ artistic approach!
• ❑ "Offener Kanal"
▼ ❑ Kluge
• ❑ every sender is a receiver and vice versa
• ❑ Video blogging and questions will be in a follow-up post
